Title: Makinde, opposition cite Wike factor, say authoritarian drift threatens 2027 polls
Summary: Makinde, opposition cite Wike factor, say authoritarian drift threatens 2027 polls . A series of explosive allegations and institutional disputes yesterday painted a troubling picture of Nigeria’s pre-2027 landscape .

Title: Investor fatigue, $14b infrastructure gap stall deep-seaports renewal plan
Summary: Nigeria’s ambition to regain its status as the leading maritime hub for West and Central Africa is faltering, with seven proposed deep-seaports .

Title: Insecurity: The making of South-East ghost towns at dusk
Summary: The belief that security has improved in the South-East since the onslaught on separatist groups, among others, is countered by clandestine activities, according to the report .

Title: Lagos government plans to regulate use of informal spaces
Summary: Lagos State Government has said that it will take decisive steps in regulating and administering informal spaces across the state . Lagos government plans to regulate use of informal spaces .

Title: PETROL: Consumers urge Dangote to expand partner stations
Summary: As MRS begins N739/litre sales, motorists urge Dangote to expand partner stations . Consumers urge the company to increase the number of its partner retail outlets in the nation’s capital .

Summary: The Nigerian Naira opened the Christmas Eve trading session with slight fluctuations against the United States Dollar across both the official and informal markets . The exchange rate today, December 24, 2025 .

Title: Insecurity: Interfaith collaboration key to ending violence in Nigeria – GIMP-Nigeria
Summary: Guild of Interfaith Media Practitioners Nigeria, GIMP-Nigeria, has urged the Federal Government and other stakeholders to embrace deliberate and sustained interfaith collaboration .

Title: Natasha shares Christmas rice, others in five Kogi LGs
Summary: Natasha Akpoti-Uduaghan has distributed more than 2,000 bags of rice and other relief items to constituents across the five local government areas in the district . The distribution was carried out simultaneously in Adavi, Ajaokuta, Okene, Okehi, and Ogori-Magongo Local Government Areas .

Title: CBN woos global investors with reforms
Summary: The Central Bank of Nigeria is taking its reform narrative to global investors, projecting policy stability, macroeconomic discipline, and renewed confidence to attract sustained capital inflows . Governor Olayemi Cardoso reassured global investors of Nigeria’s renewed commitment to macroeconomic stability, transparent markets and predictable policy direction .

Title: Adeleke’s defection attracting more members to Accord – Chair
Summary: The Accord has announced a surge in nationwide membership following the defection of Osun State Governor, Senator Ademola Adeleke, to its platform . Title: Court seizes land linked to Goodluck Jonathan estate
Summary: The Federal High Court in Abuja has ordered the final forfeiture of two expansive parcels of land earmarked for the Goodluck Jonathan Legacy Model Housing Estate . Justice Mohammed Umar made the order while ruling on a motion on notice filed by the Independent Corrupt Practices and Other Related Offences Commission .
